p: Peptide ZY13 (VKRWKKWRWKWKKWV) and a scrambled control peptide Scr-ZY13 (KRWVWKRWVKKWKWK) with C-terminals amidated (-NH 2) were synthesized by GL Biochem (Shanghai) Ltd. (Shanghai, China) and analyzed by reversed-phase high-performance liquid chromatography (RP-HPLC) and mass spectrometry to confirm their purity greater than 98%.
